mapper.select: SELECT e_name, e_link, e_img, e_start, e_end, e_museum FROM e_exhibition WHERE e_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR e_museum LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND e_display = 1
SELECT e_idx, e_name, e_link, e_img, e_museum, e_start, e_img, e_end FROM e_exhibition WHERE e_display = 1;
SELECT e_name FROM e_exhibition WHERE e_name = #{eName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO e_exhibition( e_museum, e_name, e_link, e_img, e_start, e_end) VALUES ( #{eMuseum}, #{eName}, #{eLink}, #{eImg}, DATE_FORMAT(#{eStart}, "%Y-%m-%d"), DATE_FORMAT(#{eEnd}, "%Y-%m-%d") )
mapper.update: UPDATE e_exhibition SET e_display = 0 WHERE e_idx = #{eIdx}
